alert.note: Alert for Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 13 at 8:00PM CDT until March 17 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yazoo River At Yazoo City affecting Yazoo County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yazoo River At Yazoo City. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning to Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Minor over bank is flooding is occurring along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 28.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Tuesday morning to a crest of 29.0 feet Tuesday morning. It will remain at this crest through Wednesday evening before starting a slow fall. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Yazoo River Yazoo City 29.0 28.6 Sun 7 pm CDT 28.8 29.0 29.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 1100 AM CDT.
